name: Jumbo Share
author: WP Maniax

sections.description:
This social share bar mimics mashable.com social share bar. It’s collapsible and contains big Ajax powered counter that counts overall shares for your posts/pages.

Jumbo Share is super easy to install and configure.

It supports most popular social networks and is fully responsive.

More Screenshots and Live Sample you can see on plugins’ home page.

Main Features:

  • Easy to install and configure
  • Most popular social networks supported (Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, LinkedIn, Reddit )
  • Fully responsive
  • Show before/after content or both
  • Shortcode available to place the jumbo share bar inside your posts/pages
  • Configure where to show (posts, pages, home, archives)
  • Ajax powered counter means your site won’t slow down.
  • Ability to completely disable counter
  • Configure counter color
  • Cache results to speed up the counter (5 minutes – 24 hours)
  • Ability to purge cache manually
  • Nice and elegant design

Feedback

http://www.wpmaniax.com/jumbo-share/
sections.installation:
1. Upload jumbo-share folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings / Jumbo Share to configure the plugin

short_description: Add Mashable.com like social share bar to your web site.
